summary: Full audit testing completed for Celora multi-tenant e-commerce platform. All original data intact, logins work with original passwords, /cpanel route works on subdomains. 9/9 backend tests passed, all UI flows verified.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All authentication flows working with original passwords. Database test_database contains original user data: 5 stores, 8 products, 5 orders ($1006.44 total), 4 customers, 9 categories. Eddie's password is Yealink1991% (SHA256 hashed).

merchant_login_original_password.notes: Login with original password works correctly, redirects to merchant dashboard

cpanel_login_subdomain.notes: CPanel login with subdomain context works, shows store branding 'Tools In A Box'

dashboard_original_data.notes: Dashboard displays all original data correctly

products_page.notes: Shows 8 products with images, prices, and stock info

orders_page.notes: Shows 5 orders (T-3150 to T-3154) with correct totals

domain_settings_page.notes: Shows subdomain toolsinabox.getcelora.com and custom domain www.toolsinabox.com.au with proper light mode styling

store_frontend.notes: Store frontend renders with 'Tools In A Box' theme, shows products and categories

mocked_apis.resend_email: Email notifications are MOCKED - no Resend API key configured
